branchCategory.name: IDFA*F, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 100~150 Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Use in Europe, Asia, and Oceania
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDAF*F refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
